thread.title: Norm Allred
thread.title_full: Warrior Trading reviewed by Norm Allred

author: Norm Allred
title: Norm Allred
text: I have been in their program for a couple of weeks or so and have found that I have learned more in the couple of weeks than any other services that I have checked out. Ross has a great team of traders in the chat room that post these trades that were previous students that he trained to be very successful and are doing webinars that you can learn from. I would recommend them to any new trader or even veteran traders! Great job Ross! I am sure I will be with you for awhile...
